name: 13 WOOD ST (itch)
description:
13 WOOD ST, a night in October: a long road, a dark forest and the house mentioned in the last will, making you the owner of a mysterious property. Welcome to 13 WOOD ST, a story rich horror game! Remastered 2022.
Are you ready for a horrible night?

Explore 13 rooms ...
Searching

Search for various items ...
Listening

Listen to various records ...
Can you unveil the story of 13 WOOD ST?

Combine the clues ...
Warning
This game contains references to suicide.
